author: Kevin Googins
comment: Love the watch face. It is awesome having the surf forecast on my wrist. It also looks very stylish on my moto 360. The one feature that would make it PERFECT is if it had the TIDES and maybe water temp. Other than that it is great. I would highly recommend the watch face/app. Best on the market. Great job!

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, Kevin. Glad you like the style. We've just updated the app to include these San Diego spots: Blacks Beach, La Jolla, Oceanside, Ocean Beach, Pacific Beach, Sunset Cliffs, Swamis, Trestles, Windansea Beach. Please update your app and you'll get these surf spots on your watch. Hope it continues to be useful for you.

author: Jeff M. Rapolti Jr., PE
comment: Wonderful app but only 3 stars because it doesnt have tides. Otherwise probably a 4 or 5 star.

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, Jeff. We've just added Florida to the latest update and now cover these spots: Cocoa Beach, Daytona Beach, Palm Beach, Panama City Beach, Ponce Inlet (New Smyrna), Reef Road, Satellite Beach, Sebastian Inlet. Hope the app continues to be useful for you, and please feel free to give us more feedback so we can improve it.

author: Graeme Mccardle
comment: I have installed is on my phone but can not find to open it up.

author: Timothy Weeks
comment: Wish it could have a couple spots on the Gulf side of Florida. Clearwater or st. Pete. Maybe even throw in Fort Myers, Naples, and Sarasota

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, Timothy. We've just updated the app (version 2.4) with these Florida spots: Clearwater, St Pete, Naples. Please update your app and you'll get these surf spots on your watch. Hope it continues to be useful for you.

title: Needs Florida West Coast

author: Joseph Robins
comment: Really would like this to work but keeps telling me it's stopped running :(

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Hi Joseph, sorry to hear you had trouble with the app. We've just releases an update (version 2.2) with improvements in stability. Please update the app on your device and let us know if it's working for you now. Thanks!

title: Doesn't work on Sony smart watch 3

author: Kensuke Saito
comment: can you add another spot at wainui beach newzealand?

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Do you know which particular spot(s) at Wainui beach NZ you'd like to add. It seems there are a few and we'd like to make sure we cover the ones that are most popular/useful for you.

title: funtastic

author: bart slingerland
comment: Thank you so much for adding nz spots! Great watchface and I like the 4 day forcast. It would be great to see a graph of the tide on that page as well and on the homepage "high at 15.20" or "low at 11.00" depending on the upcoming tide change.  But great app!

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. To make it easy to navigate on the watch, we've limited to a selection of popular spots for now but will keep improving this. We've just added New Zealand (Piha, Forestry, Mount Maunganui) and a bunch of new features in version 2.0. Please update the app on your device and let us know what you think.

title: Great watchface

author: Kevin Skeen
comment: 1 star because each time I add watch face to moto360 I get the error 'unfortunately surface has stopped' when tapping on face. Unusable

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We've just released an update for the watch face (version 2.1). Could you please update it on your device and give it a try?

title: Doesn't work on moto360

author: Daniel vd Merwe
comment: The app installs on my HTC one but I can't find it afterwards.

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We've added a bunch of new features and fixes in version 2.0. Please update the app on your device and let us know what you think. After you install it on your phone, it should automatically install on your Android Wear watch and you'll need to select the watch face on your watch to activate it. Did that work for you?

title: Wtf

author: Ron Sparks
comment: It would be great if you added more locations, allowed settings from the phone, and allowed a search feature to find surf spots. There are almost no USA spots in the app.   Looks good, performs flawlessly - you just need more setting options.

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. We had to make some improvements to the spot selection menu to make it easier to select from an increasingly long list of spots before adding more. We've just done that and added a few more surf spots in Central California for a start. What other USA spots would you recommend adding? Working on phone settings next.

title: Good features - not enough locations.

reply.author: Tokyotribe
reply.content: Hi Ted, unfortunately the Samsung Gear S2 doesn't support Android Wear because it runs the Tizen Operating System, so wear apps like Surface won't be able to run on it. Sorry about that!
